quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Hinata Shoyo

quote: Do you need a reason to not want to lose?
author: Hinata Shoyo

quote: You dont win alone. Thats just how it is.
author: Kageyama Tobio

quote: Life is a bore if you dont challenge yourself.
author: Nishinoya Yu

quote: Being weak means that there is room to grow.
author: Takeda Ittetsu

quote: He who climbs the ladder must begin at the bottom.
author: Takeda Ittetsu

quote: Talent is something you make bloom, instinct is something you polish.
author: Oikawa Tooru

quote: Little by little, what you have begun will naturally become important to you. What you need at the start is a little bit of curiosity.
author: Shimizu Kiyoko

quote: There is no game that you cant win, and there is no game that you will win for sure.
author: Ukai Ikkei

quote: No encouragement, just the truth. No more words are needed from the one great friend to the other.
author: Ohira Reon

quote: Motivation? What more do you need than pride!
author: Yamaguchi Tadashi

quote: You should know better than anyone that you have failed the moment you lose your cool.
author: Sawamura Daichi

quote: Someone who cant see the opponent standing right in front of him, cant defeat the opponent that lies beyond.
author: Iwaizumi Hajime

quote: Humans have no wings, so they search for a way to fly.
author: Ukai Keishin

quote: Luck? No way. You are only an ace if you are able to create miracles.
author: Goshiki Tsutomu

quote: Humans are like the blood in our veins. We must flow without stopping. Keep the oxygen moving and our mind working
author: Kuroo Tetsuro

quote: A defense with no holes doesnt exist.
author: Wakatoshi Ushijima

quote: If you're going to hit it, hit it until it breaks.
author: Oikawa Tooru

quote: Repetition, being methodical, and being through just feels nice.
author: Shinsuke Kita

quote: It is not just the enemy that can push you beyond our limits.
author: Ryunosuke Tanaka

quote: Being strong is being free.
author: Yamaguchi Tadashi

quote: Isnt it more fun having something you cant seem to defeat?
author: Kuroo Tetsuro

quote: If you keep your cool, you will be able to see what action to take.
author: Bokuto Kotaro

quote: I am not number one in anything at this point in time. But that is not enough of a reason to quit, nor is it an excuse.
author: Ryunosuke Tanaka

quote: If we approach each problem one at a time, we will be able to figure this out.
author: Takeda Ittetsu

quote: I am built upon the small things I do everyday, and the end results are no more than a byproduct of that.
author: Kita Shinsuke

quote: It's painful. I want to stop. When I feel that way, I take a step forwards.
author: Hinata Shoyo

quote: Townsperson B (trivial role) in a play can fight too!
author: Yachi Hitoka

quote: Me saying I can't is one thing. But if somebody else tells me that, I don't like it.
author: Tsukishima Kei

quote: You train, keep training, then train some more. The countless hours you put in, the progress made... All of it can come to a screeching halt in the blink of an eye... So what if it does, though?
author: Shimizu Kiyoko

quote: Victory goes to the team that connects.
author: Ukai Keishin

quote: ...if you only pay attention to what's 'above', you'll get tripped up from below.
author: Ukai Keishin

quote: Don't forget the frustration and bitterness you felt losing. However, you don't need to hold onto the feeling of losing. Hurry up and wipe that away!
author: Ukai Keishin

quote: In the end, those who do not want to change will not evolve.
author: Nekomata Yasufumi

quote: But no matter how much we do... or how good we are at doing it... for us, there's no such thing as 'good enough.'
author: Washijō Tanji

quote: Humans are like mortals who stumbled upon a monsters' banquet.
author: Kita Shinsuke

quote: I can't do fancy plays, but I can build a solid foundation
author: Sawamura Daichi

quote: Skills and talent arent meant to be had. They are meant to be shown. When you go against the world, make sure you go berserk
author: National Coach

quote: Being a go-getter and thoughtless are two different things.
author: Takeda Ittetsu

quote: Dont go underestimating what it takes to be a ball boy
author: Ukai Keishin

quote: Simplicity and Fortitude
author: Johzenji High

quote: Show us Your Tenacity
author: Wakutani Minami High

quote: Even Small Streams Form Strong Rivers
author: Tsubakihara Academy

quote: Iron Wall of Date
author: Date Tech High

quote: Habit Becomes Second Nature
author: Kamomedai High

quote: We Dont Need Things Like Memories
author: Inarizaki High

quote: One Heart,Mind and Soul
author: Fukurōdani Academy

quote: Rule the Court
author: Aoba Josai High
